Title: Sounds of Silence
Plot: Two women run over a deaf man who was dead before he was hit. Catherine and Nick investigate an apparent mob hit that leaves five dead in a coffee shop.
GuestStars: Deanne Bray, Mario Schugel, Tom Gallop, Elaine Kagan, Jonah Rooney, Austin Nichols, Arlene Malinowski, Greg Anderson, Scott Jesic Caddill, Joseph Patrick Kelly, Caroline Barba, Samantha Harris, Joannah Portman, B
